title: New: Yung Life – Breaker
content:
It’s a wet, windy Tuesday evening, I have a horrendous cold and I’m trying to compile countless End of Year lists.

Luckily, what should fall into my lap, but none other than a brand new track from Knoxville’s Yung Life, in the form of the hugely 80’s inspired Breaker. It’s gloriously upbeat, kind of like a-ha brought into the 21st century and embodying the spirit of a angsty, lovelorn, New Order listening teenager. Grab a free download of Breaker below, and keep your ears peeled for a new EP in 2012.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
